title: Iris 5 Tempel
description:
This is how we would describe our apartment in a few words:
Inside: Outside: 
Our apartment Iris 5 Tempel is located in the central and beautiful Tempelhof area.
The property is situated on the 1st floor (for US guests +1).

It’s a great place to discover Berlin and a comfortable place to come home to.
Also:
- lowest price guarantee 
- secure payment, no hidden costs
- amend, cancel and rebook with no extra fees
Check more specific info about our apartment below the page.

Questions or doubts? Please feel free to contact us.

The prices are an indication and can be a bit lower or higher because of discounts and seasonal adjustments.
address: Calle de la Dama de Elche 9
